name: symbol_order_book_ticker
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool crypto_markets.
Tool description: Get all crypto markets data live
API description: Fetches the order book ticker information for a specific cryptocurrency symbol using RapidAPI.

symbol.description: The symbol for the cryptocurrency (e.g., 'BTCUSDT'). Defaults to 'BTCUSDT'. If not provided, bookTickers for all symbols will be returned in an array.
